                  float x,

                  float width,

                  com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion buttonUp,
                  com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion buttonDown,
                  boolean isButtonEnabled)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        name - Tag of Button
        x - X position of Button
        y - Y position of Button
        width - Button width
        height - Button height
        buttonUp - Button Unpressed texture
        buttonDown - Button Pressed texture
        isButtonEnabled - Button Disabled true/false
